+)

body:
Thanks for the fixes. There is one more request from our build team: could you make this a `cc_binary` with `linkshared=1` and test if it works? This aligns with TF's roadmap about tf.contrib and will help to make future integration/migration easier.

Other than that, this PR looks good to me.
body_html:
Thanks for the fixes. There is one more request from our build team: could you make this a cc_binary with linkshared=1 and test if it works? This aligns with TF's roadmap about tf.contrib and will help to make future integration/migration easier.

Other than that, this PR looks good to me.
body_text:
Thanks for the fixes. There is one more request from our build team: could you make this a cc_binary with linkshared=1 and test if it works? This aligns with TF's roadmap about tf.contrib and will help to make future integration/migration easier.
Other than that, this PR looks good to me.
